title: Anatoly Khokhlov
text: Anatoly Petrovich Khokhlov (29 October 1947 – March 2008) was a Soviet <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201972%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Welterweight">men's welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1972%20Summer%20Olympics">1972 Summer Olympics</a>.
